V.iii.12.C.1.d
.
Presumptive SC for MS
Presumptive service connection (SC) may be established for MS if the disease becomes manifest within seven years from the date of separation.
Reference
:  For more information on requirements for establishment of presumptive SC, see
38 CFR 3.307(a)
38 CFR 3.309
, and
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 2.B
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 12, Section C - Progressive Neurological Disorders
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 12, Section C
